item.title: Privacy Policy for Cubby Calendar
item.description:
Last Updated: January 3, 2026

Introduction

Welcome to Cubby Calendar (“we,” “our,” or “the App”). This Privacy Policy explains how we handle information when you use our mobile application.

In short: We do not collect, store, transmit, or share any of your personal data. Everything stays on your device.

Information We Do NOT Collect

Cubby Calendar is designed with your privacy as the top priority. We do not collect any information about you, including but not limited to:

item.title: Privacy Policy for MusiPaper
item.description:
Privacy Policy for MusiPaper

Last Updated: January 6, 2026

Introduction

MusiPaper (“we,” “our,” or “the app”) is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle information when you use our iOS application.

Information We Collect

Information We DO NOT Collect

MusiPaper is designed with privacy in mind. We do not collect, store, or transmit any of the following:

  • ‚ùå Personal identification information (name, email, phone number)
  • ‚ùå Location data
  • ‚ùå Usage analytics or behavioral data
  • ‚ùå Device information or identifiers
  • ‚ùå Contacts, photos, or other personal files
  • ‚ùå Browsing history or search queries

Information Stored Locally on Your Device

The following information is stored only on your device and never leaves your iPhone/iPad:

1. Information Collection

We do NOT collect, store, or transmit any personal information.

item.title: Privacy Policy - [iOS] MDX Reader
item.description:
Last Updated: December 16, 2025

Introduction

MDX Reader (“we”, “our”, or “the app”) is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle your information when you use our application.

Information We Collect

What We DON’T Collect

MDX Reader is designed with privacy in mind. We DO NOT:

  • Collect any personal information
  • Track your usage or behavior
  • Access your contacts, location, or photos
  • Use analytics or tracking services
  • Share any data with third parties
  • Require account creation or login
  • Connect to external servers

What We Store Locally

All data is stored locally on your device only:

item.title: MDX Reader
item.description:
üéØ Product Positioning

MDX Reader - Your Professional Offline Dictionary Reader

A modern dictionary reading application designed for macOS & iOS, supporting MDX format dictionaries with complete offline functionality, privacy protection, and excellent user experience.

‚ú® Core Features

1. üìö Professional Dictionary Support

  • MDX 1.x / 2.0 Format: Full support for mainstream dictionary formats
  • MDD Resource Files: Multimedia resources including images, audio, and video
  • Multi-Encoding Support: Automatic detection of UTF-8, UTF-16, and GBK
  • Multi-Dictionary Search: Query across multiple dictionaries simultaneously

2. üîç Intelligent Search Experience

  • Real-time Search Suggestions: Instant results as you type
  • Smart Prefix Matching: Accurately find target entries
  • Search History: Save up to 30 recent queries for quick access
  • Keyboard Navigation: Arrow keys to navigate, Enter to confirm

3. üé® Elegant Interface Design

  • Beautiful Dark Mode: Eye-friendly for extended reading sessions
  • Polished Light Mode: Clear and bright for various environments
  • System Theme Following: Automatic switching for seamless experience
  • Highly Customizable:
    • Font selection (all system fonts available)
    • Font size adjustment (10-24px)
    • Line spacing adjustment (1.0-2.5x)
    • Custom content padding

4. ‚≠ê Powerful Management Features

  • Favorites Management: One-click to bookmark important entries
  • Organized by Dictionary: Clear categorical display
  • Quick Access: Tap history or favorites to view instantly
  • Smart Sorting: Most recent entries displayed first

5. üé§ Multi-language Text-to-Speech

  • System TTS Support: Uses native macOS speech engine
  • Automatic Language Detection: Intelligently recognizes Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean, and more
  • Natural Pronunciation: Near human-like reading quality
  • One-Click Reading: Tap to hear pronunciation

6. üîí Privacy-First Design

  • 100% Offline Usage: No network connection required
  • Zero Data Collection: No tracking, uploading, or analytics
  • Local Storage: All data stays on your Mac
  • No Account Required: Open and use immediately, no registration

7. üåè International Support

Supports 10 language interfaces:

Thank you for choosing MDX Reader (“we,” “our,” or “the App”). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains our practices regarding data collection, use, and protection.

Important: MDX Reader is designed with privacy-first principles. We do NOT collect, store, transmit, or share any personal data.

item.title: Privacy Policy for EchoTalk
item.description:
Privacy Policy for EchoTalk

Last Updated: December 24, 2025

Introduction

EchoTalk (“we”, “our”, or “us”) is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application.

Information We Collect

Information You Provide

  • Voice Recordings: Your voice recordings are processed locally on your device for speech recognition and translation purposes.
  • Translation History: Conversation history is stored locally on your device only.
  • Custom Avatars: Profile pictures you upload are stored locally on your device.
  • App Settings: Your preferences and settings are saved locally.

Automatically Collected Information

  • Device Information: We may collect basic device information for app functionality (iOS version, device model).
  • Crash Reports: Anonymous crash reports to help us improve app stability.

How We Use Your Information

We use the collected information to:

item.title: Privacy Policy for TidyPic
item.description:
Last Updated: January 5, 2026

Introduction

TidyPic (“we,” “our,” or “the App”) is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle information when you use our mobile application.

Information We Collect

1. Photo Library Access

  • What We Access: TidyPic requires access to your photo library to scan for screenshots, videos, duplicate photos, and similar photos.
  • How We Use It: All photo scanning and analysis is performed locally on your device. We do not upload, store, or transmit your photos to any external servers.
  • User Control: You can revoke photo library access at any time through your device’s Settings > Privacy > Photos.

2. Device Storage Information

  • We collect information about your device’s storage capacity and usage to display storage statistics.
  • This data is processed locally and is not transmitted to external servers.

3. In-App Purchase Information

  • When you purchase the Premium version, Apple processes the transaction through their secure payment system.
  • We do not collect or store your payment information.
  • We only receive a verification that the purchase was successful.

4. Analytics and Crash Reports (Optional)

  • We may collect anonymous usage statistics and crash reports to improve app performance.
  • This information does not include any personal data or photos.
  • You can opt out of analytics in your device settings.

How We Use Your Information

We use the information we collect to:
